definitions: having the effect of making something less warm or hot

examples.text: she took a cooling dip in the ocean

shortDefinitions: having effect of making something less warm or hot

examples.text: fall is my favorite season because of the cooling weather
increased trade is a sign of cooling tensions between the two countries

definitions: (in traditional Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine) denoting or relating to something, typically food or medicine, that is cooling, refreshing, or calming to the body

examples.text: after giving birth, stay away from cooling food like pineapples and watermelon

definitions: (of a person's constitution) sensitive to cold; susceptible to disorders such as colds, fatigue, or sore muscles and joints

examples.text: someone with a cooling body disposition has cold hands and feet

definitions: the action or process of making or becoming less hot or warm

examples.text: the cooling of our core body temperature helps initiate sleep
